title.rendered: SCORE Austin and Fundbox Small Business Accelerator

content.rendered:
Fundbox Accelerator Returns to Austin with SCORE

As any small business owner will tell you, it’s hard to start one.  Between having to be an expert at literally everything, to the challenges of getting customers to pay their bills on time (check out the small business unpaid invoice economy), unless this work is truly your life calling,… then forget it.   But don’t just take our word for it, here are a few amazing Austin small business owners discussing what they wish they knew when they first started out.  

This is why Fundbox is teaming up with SCORE Austin to pilot a new small business accelerator to be held in Austin on November 9.  The accelerator brings together some amazing subject experts including the internationally recognized small business marketing expert Ron Cates, who will offer effective strategies for growing your business.

The accelerator will have two sessions, one in the morning and one in the afternoon. All of the proceeds from this event will be donated to SCORE Austin.  

So please join us and feel free to bring a friend.  We hope to see you there!  #Austin #Smallbizlove
